723811f-a.text:
(1)
Wadsworth Avenue, west side, north from 187th Street, seen from the S.W. corner. The block of eight little houses, from 187th to 188th Streets, was built around 1895, and considerably antedates anything else in the picture. Wadsworth Gardens, the apartment house on the N.W. corner of 188th Street, was
built between 1922 and 1925.
November 3, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, seen from the S.E. corner.
November 3, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
